options.content:
Welcome to OMCS Operational Dashboard
Release Date: ${deploymentDate} | v${version}

panels.description:
Percentage of product published at LTA vs expected products to be published from PRIP

Time Period (based on publication date at PRIP) : now-3d to now-4d (24h sliding window, 3 days in the past)

targets.query: mission: S1 AND product_level:$product_level_lta AND product_type: $product_type_lta AND prip_id: *
mission: S1 AND product_level:$product_level_lta AND product_type: $product_type_lta AND prip_id: *

panels.description:
Percentage of product published at DD vs expected products to be published from PRIP

Time Period (based on publication date at PRIP) : now-3d to now-4d (24h sliding window, 3 days in the past)

targets.query: mission: S1 AND product_level:$product_level_dd AND product_type: $product_type_dd AND prip_id: * AND dddas_publication_date:*
mission: S1 AND product_level:$product_level_dd AND product_type: $product_type_dd AND prip_id: *

panels.description:

panels.title: S5

panels.description:
Completeness % for NRT & NRT-PT products only

Time period “Last day” : now-3h - now-27h (sliding window of 24h)

targets.query: mission: S1 AND (timeliness: NRT OR timeliness: NRT-PT)
mission: S1 AND (timeliness: NRT OR timeliness: NRT-PT)

panels.title: S1

panels.description:
Completeness % for all products

Time period “Last day” : now-7h - now-31h (sliding window of 24h)

targets.query: mission:S2
mission:S2

panels.title: S2

panels.description:
Completeness % for NR products only

Time period “Last day” : now-3h - now-27h (sliding window of 24h)

targets.query: mission:S3 AND timeliness : NR
mission:S3 AND timeliness : NR

panels.title: S3

panels.description:
Completeness % for NRTI products only

Time period “Last day” : now-7h - now-31h 

(sliding window of 24h)

targets.query: mission:S5 AND timeliness : NRTI
mission:S5 AND timeliness : NRTI

panels.title: S5

panels.description:
Succesful passes (from EDRS daily reports / Planned passes)

Time period : Yesterday ( between now-48h to now-24h)

targets.query: * AND report_name_daily: *
!total_status: "NOK" AND report_name_daily: *

panels.title: EDRS

panels.description:
The percentage of successful passes (from acquisition status published at Cadip, X-Band for S5) / Planned passes

Time period “Last day” : now-3h - now-27h (sliding window of 24h)

targets.query: * AND NOT mission:S5
mission:S5
global_status: OK AND NOT mission:S5
antenna_status: OK AND front_end_status : OK AND delivery_push_status: OK AND mission:S5

panels.title: X-Band

list.description: MAAS CDS last main version delivered
list.name: version
